cards.title: You won't believe the transformation!
cards.firstSubtitle: Once you hand in your setup, rest asure, you'll  be carrying something really amazing to home.
cards.secondSubtitle: And we always keep our promises.

cards.title: Enough with those boring consoles!
cards.firstSubtitle: Still rocking that antique, vanilla look on your PlayStation or Xbox?

cards.title: We even have a mod lab!
cards.firstSubtitle: You didn't find the perfect design for your setup? Don't even worry, we got you a whole mod customization lab.
cards.secondSubtitle: Now perfection is up to you.
